channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In a year of steep challenges, there were still shining moments in global health
item.description: The Trump administration's deep cuts in U.S. foreign health aid had a devastating impact. Yet there were achievements of note in spite of it all.

item.title: How America Loses Vaccine Access
item.description: America could all but lose vaccine access. Here’s how.

item.title: An escalation in Yemen threatens to reignite civil war and widen tensions in the Gulf

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, Kennedy Daughter Who Wrote of Her Cancer, Dies at 35
item.description: An environmental journalist and child of Caroline Kennedy, she recently wrote of her battle with leukemia in The New Yorker, drawing worldwide sympath...

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to continue to seek funding for the CFPB
item.description: The order is the latest in a complex legal battle over the fate of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, a watchdog agency.

item.title: What being around death taught this hospital chaplain about life
item.description: J.S. Park helps patients and their families cope with death every day as a hospital chaplain. He explains what to expect as a person is dying, and how...

item.title: How Russia and Ukraine Are Fighting to Shape Trump’s View of the War
item.description: Off the battlefield, each side is trying to influence President Trump’s perception of the military conflict as they look to negotiate a peace settleme...

item.title: Why Does Trump Get Away With It?
item.description: The president feels no guilt and has no qualms.

item.title: Israel says it will bar aid groups, including Doctors Without Borders, from Gaza

item.title: Crew Paints Russian Flag on Oil Tanker Pursued by the U.S. Coast Guard
item.description: The U.S. military tried to intercept the Bella 1 last week in the Caribbean Sea as it headed to Venezuela to pick up oil.

item.title: The Separation: Inside the Unraveling U.S.-Ukraine Partnership
item.description: As President Trump sought a peace deal and Vladimir V. Putin sought victory, factions in the White House and Pentagon bled the Ukrainian war efforts.

item.title: China Fires Rockets Near Taiwan in Display of Military Power
item.description: China’s military also sent warships and aircraft during a second day of exercises designed to show its ability to claim the democratic island.
